author: tore
msg: Fixed an array out of bounds that caused some combinations of word/pattern to crash

author: keiron
msg: fixes a couple of problems when placing foreign objects near

author: tore
msg: Some fonts contains malformed composite glyphs which used to make fop crash. This adds
an errormessage and tries to embed the font without the composite glyph.

author: tore
msg: Moved mapping from character to cid from LineArea to PDFRenderer. This fixes bug no 1681
and other issues with wrong characters being displayed when using CID fonts.
